questions.text: Does the website look professional and is it aesthetically pleasing?
questions.affirmative: It brought a tear to my eye. :’)
questions.negative: It brought a tear to my eye. :’(

questions.text: Is there a professional logo?
questions.negative: It’s like Comic Sans and Papyrus had a baby.

questions.text: Is there a call to action (CTA) or key message in the main banner?
questions.shortpositive: Clear call to action and key message.
questions.shortnegative: Missing call to action or key message.
questions.negative: Not even if you squint and tilt your head.

questions.text: Is there a contact number on the top of the website?
questions.shortpositive: Contact number on top of website.
questions.shortnegative: No contact number on top of website.
questions.negative: I’d have more luck getting digits from a supermodel.

questions.text: Is it immediately clear what the business does?
questions.shortpositive: It's clear what the business is about.
questions.shortnegative: It's unclear what the business is about.
questions.negative: Yes: make people leave their website quickly.

questions.text: Can you tell what the primary action or goal the website is asking for?
questions.shortnegative: Need a primary action for visitors to take.
questions.negative: Their goal must be to drive visitors away.

questions.text: Can you tell what the secondary action/s the website is asking for?
questions.shortpositive: Clear secondary actions for visitors to take.
questions.shortnegative: No secondary actions for visitors to take.
questions.negative: Just the void staring back at me.

questions.text: Is the menu navigation logical and easy to move around the website?
questions.negative: I just wanted to use the word “labyrinthine”.

questions.text: Are there social media share buttons?
questions.shortnegative: No social media share buttons present.
questions.negative: More like ANTIsocial, am I right?!

questions.text: Is there a lead capture form on every page?
questions.shortpositive: Lead capture forms on every page.
questions.shortnegative: No lead capture forms on every page.
questions.negative: They’re clearly relying on magic instead.

questions.text: Are there customer testimonials or reviews?
Google their website. Does it make the first page?
Does the website take 3 seconds or less to load?
Is it responsive?
Is there a unique page title on every page? (Check the tab)
Does the page title include their brand?
questions.shortnegative: Brand missing in page title tags.

questions.text: Is there a unique meta description for each page?
questions.shortpositive: Unique meta descriptions for each page.
questions.shortnegative: No unique meta descriptions for each page.

questions.text: Are there at least 500 words on each page?
Is the copy a good read?
Is the copy easy to digest with paragraph breaks and bullets?
questions.shortpositive: Copy is easy to read and digest.
questions.shortnegative: Copy is hard to read and digest.

questions.text: Is there content with keywords above the fold?
questions.shortnegative: No keyword-rich content above the fold.

questions.text: Are there keywords in headings?
questions.shortnegative: Little or no keywords in headings.

questions.text: Do all internal hyperlinks work correctly?
Is there a site map?
QUESTION Y
QUESTION Z
